unnormalised: The IPL 2024 final is scheduled for 26/05/2024, with the toss expected at 7:30 PM IST and the match commencing at 8:00 PM IST. Any rescheduling due to weather will be announced by the BCCI by 12:00 PM on 26th May 2024. Stay tuned to Star Sports for live updates and timings for all upcoming matches in the series.
normalised: The I-P-L two thousand and twenty four final is scheduled for twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty four, with the toss expected at seven thirty P-M I-S-T and the match commencing at eight P-M I-S-T. Any rescheduling due to weather will be announced by the B-C-C-I by twelve P-M on twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty four. Stay tuned to Star Sports for live updates and timings for all upcoming matches in the series.
